, a small plane flies once a week (Mondays). Price is 1,600,000 per person (as at September 2013).
It is also possible to take a ten-hour 4WD drive on other days, by arrangement (thus cost varies).

value: content=Rooms cost rp 20,000 or rp 30,000. Don't expect much luxury but the owner is charming, his daughter (when there) can speak English and the coffee is quite good.

WARNING: Sea travels in this area are quite an adventure. Don't even plan to go there if you have less than 4 days available.
(local name Pulau Banyak) is the obvious destination from Singkil.

value: Ferry leaves every Tuesday at 10 o'clock. It is the only dependable transportation available. Cost 20,000.

Wooden boats are available, but it is quite an adventure. Boats leave only when the weather, the tide, the waves and the captain's mood are OK. If they tell you the boat leaves at 10 am, be there at 9 and bring a good book as it may leave at 1 pm... or not at all. The travel costs rp 30,000.
A much easier way is to charter a speedboat. But they will charge an outrageous rp 1,000,000 (shared among all passengers, maximum 4) to go to
